content: the forever love headband is a simple and beautiful make made with single_crochet half_double_crochet and chain stitches perfect for any adventures beginner you can use it as it is or turn it into an amazing floral wreath by adding all the beautiful flowers that will be made and then attached on the final part of our midsummers dream cal now on friday the 25th of june to make the headband you ll need about 15 grams of yarn a hook that goes with it and an elastic hair tie that s it we have used must-haves in the color eucalyptus by yarn and colors along with a 3 mm hook in the tutorial the forever love headband is the fourth design in the midsummers dream cal that is hosted by us at sistersinstitch between the 21st to the 25th of june 2021 together we are making the forever love wreath that will be revealed later this week and this headband makes the base of it you will find more information about the mini cal and the other flowers by visiting our homepage www sistersinstitch com/midsummers-dream-cal-2021 we can t wait to see all beautiful flowers come to life so please remember to share your progress and makes with us #foreverloveheadband #midsummersdreamcal #foreverlovewreath @sistersinstitch @crochetedbytess we wish you lots of fun xxx tess
